title: #534: Monopoly of Violence with Carey Wedler
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Anarchist and Journalist Carey Wedler to the show to discuss the war on information and the monopoly of violence our government craves. The problem isn't people it's the government and it's funding of chaos. This was a banger and thank you for your support.

Check out Sam Tripoli Live and grab your tickets at Samtripoli.com:
